thread.title: ONGC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Non Executive, Field MO & GDMO Posts
thread.title_full: ONGC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Non Executive, Field MO & GDMO Posts

author: publisher12
title: ONGC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Non Executive, Field MO & GDMO Posts

organizations.name: science and trade certificate in electrician trade

text: 1. Assistant Technician (Instrumentation) – A2: 02 Posts 2. Junior Assistant Technician(Electrical) – A1: 02 Posts 3. Junior Assistant (Accounts) – A1: 07 Posts 4. Junior Assistant (Personnel & Administration) – A1: 02 Posts 5. Junior Assistant (Steno-English) – A1: 02 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age should be between 18-30 years (born between 07-03-1987 to 07-03-1999) for Gen, 18-35 years for ST (born between 07-03-1982 to 07-03-1999) for A1 & A2 Posts as on 06-03-2017. For more information refer the notification. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess 3 years Diploma in Instrumentation Engineering for Post 1, High School or X Class Equivalent Board Examinations with Science and Trade Certificate in Electrician Trade with a valid Certificate of Competency as Electrical Supervisor for Post 2, B.Com. with typing speed of 30 w.p.m and Certificate/ Diploma of minimum duration of 6 months in Computer Applications in the Office Environment for Post 3 & for more information refer the notification. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on test. Registration Fee: Candidates should deposite Rs. 300/- (Over and above the Registration fee an amount of Rs 20/- shall be payable to the bank as bank charges) non-refundable through Challan at any branch of State Bank of India in ONGC Power Jyoti A/C No 30827318409 of SBI, Tel Bhavan, Dehradun. No fee for SC/ ST/ PWD/ Ex-Servicemen candidates. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www.ongcindia.com from 30-01-2017 to 06-03-2017 till 18.00 hrs. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Before applying online candidates should have valid e-mail id & contact no. 2. Log on to www.ongcindia.com 3. Click on “Career—>Notices”. 4. Select the desired notification & click on it. 5. Read the instructions carefully & Click on “Apply Online”. 6. Fill the details carefully & submit the form. 7. Take a print out of online application for future use. Important Dates: Starting Date for Online Application: 30-01-2017. Last Date for Online Application: 06-03-2017 till 18.00 hrs. Written Test Date (Tentative): 02-04-2017. For more details like emolument, vacancy details, qualification & other information click on the link given below…. Click here to Apply Online ONGC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Field MO & GDMO Posts: Oil & Natural Gas Corporation Limited (ONGC), Western Offshore Unit, Mumbai has inivted applications for the recruitment of Field Medical Officer (MO) – (Offshore), General Duty Medical Officer (GDMO) – (Onshore Duty) vacancies on contract basis. Eligible candidates can apply online & walk in interview on 04-02-2017 at 09:30 am. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… ONGC Vacancy Details:
